scripts.mandelbrot:wasm: asc assembly/mandelbrot.ts --target release --runtime stub --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -b build/mandelbrot.wasm
scripts.mandelbrot:asm: asc assembly/mandelbrot.ts --target release --runtime stub --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -j build/mandelbrot.js
scripts.game-of-life:wasm: asc assembly/game-of-life.ts --target release --runtime stub --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -b build/game-of-life.wasm
scripts.game-of-life:asm: asc assembly/game-of-life.ts --target release --runtime stub --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -j build/game-of-life.js
scripts.array:wasm: asc assembly/array.ts --target release --runtime stub --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -b build/array.wasm --exportRuntime
scripts.array:asm: asc assembly/array.ts --target release --runtime stub --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -j build/array.js
scripts.webgl:wasm: asc assembly/webgl.ts --target release --runtime minimal --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -b build/webgl.wasm --exportRuntime
scripts.webgl-as-bind:wasm: asc assembly/webgl-as-bind.ts --target release --runtime minimal --transform as-bind --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -b build/webgl-as-bind.wasm --exportRuntime
scripts.performance:wasm: asc assembly/performance.ts --target release --runtime stub --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -b build/performance.wasm --exportRuntime
scripts.performance:asm: asc assembly/performance.ts --target release --runtime stub --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -j build/performance.js
scripts.as-bind:wasm: asc assembly/as-bind.ts --target release --transform as-bind --runtime minimal --use Math=JSMath --importMemory -b build/as-bind.wasm --exportRuntime
scripts.base64:wasm: asc assembly/base64.ts --target release --transform as-bind --runtime stub -b build/base64.wasm --exportRuntime
scripts.gltf-renderer:wasm: asc assembly/gltf-renderer.ts --target release --transform as-bind --runtime minimal -b build/gltf-renderer.wasm --exportRuntime
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
